name: Professional Aviation School Bologna
about: Professional Aviation School Bologna is a premier flight training institution in Italy, dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education. Our school combines the highest standards required by airlines with a unique learning experience, offering courses such as ATPL Frozen, PPL EASA, and CIRRUS transition training. We are ENAC AREA 100 KSA certified, ensuring our students develop the necessary knowledge, skills, and attitudes from the outset. Our experienced instructors and modern aircraft fleet ensure students receive comprehensive theoretical and practical training, preparing them for careers with top airlines. With a strong emphasis on safety and collaboration, we foster an environment where students can thrive and achieve their aviation goals. At Professional Aviation School Bologna, we are committed to turning your aviation dreams into reality.
